> Mustex:  Thunderstorm if you're up there you and Gorzo keep an eye on
> those guys, but don't fire unless I say so or they attack.
>

{Panthos}

    Within the bowels of the Catz base Panthos stalked through the corridors
which seemed almost familiar to him. This ship was either Maximal in design
or a convert of predicon make. Either way it was hardly difficult to make
his way down through the almost deserted decks to the main core area.

    By the flashing lights and hub bub above him it was clear something was
going on. As he sat on his haunches looking over a panel he reached up
activating an outside cam. When the picture tuned in  he grinned an almost
feral grin as he padded quickly past the engines. Typical configurations and
typical locations for those annoying shields. "Panthos terrorize!" He spoke
as he shifted back standing upright as he assumed his robotic form, his
visor scanned the shields main circuitry.

Shrugging he lashed out punching his metallic fist through the circuit board
in front of him, his fingers uncurling inside grasping the wires and tugging
hard, tearing at the systems guts, ripping the wiring out with a mighty tug
and growl.

Watching the monitors for the shields flickering as the power that fueled
this them flickered and died. Moving quickly he opened a hatch to the crawl
spaces, which weren't much for crawling since they usually were constructed
so a bot could stand upright within. Running along this his scanners looked
for a hatch leading outside. The "leaders" who owned this base weren't going
to be too pleased that someone had slipped inside and tore the wiring from
thier shield generator...for such comedic ranting Panthos wanted to be on
the outside of the base and out of turret range...
